description: The design of this application promised to be exactly what I was looking for. It looks like they are on the right track in terms of providing just basic features so you can dive in and start using it. However, when attempting to insert images, I was only able to see a link tag of the image.
summary: I like that its basic set of features, but images would not embed

description: really nice options like different files and mulitple stacks in the same file, can view front or back first.
This flash card program is perfect, having a highly configurable quiz system, an import and export system that supports various file types, an intuitive layout and a thorough help file.
